item.title: Docs: v3.8.13
item.description:
发布时间 2022-06-28 14:56:44

cloudpods

仓库地址: https://github.com/yunionio/cloudpods

9 commits to cloudpods - v3.8.13 since this release.

Bug Fixes (7)

  • scheduler options not updated by OptionManager (282cbb1624, Qiu Jian)
  • imageinfo.OsInfo empty for 3.8 (#14507) (49e1495417, Jian Qiu)
  • splitable auto_incremental steps should be more than 1 (in case of HA setup) (#14501) (63b9bb0167, Jian Qiu)
  • climc create aksk not return access_key (#14485) (2b107a960d, Jian Qiu)
  • region: not delete groupnetwork when deleting guest (#14490) (d94ca385bb, Jian Qiu)
  • region: azure region city (8c5199ae84, ioito)
  • telegraf-raid-plugin: release-1.6.4 image (30f2619fd8, Zexi Li)

Host_health (1)

  • auto migrate on host shutdown (#14525) (db90c90dda, wanyaoqi)

Others (1)

  • Automated cherry pick of #14497: fix(region,host): auto migrate on host down (#14511) (340cf2fab9, wanyaoqi)

cloudpods-operator

仓库地址: https://github.com/yunionio/cloudpods-operator

3 commits to cloudpods-operator - v3.8.13 since this release.

Bug Fixes (2)

  • update DefaultTelegrafRaidImageTag to release-1.6.4 (fe981341, Zexi Li)
  • operator: use telegraf-init release-1.19.2-0 (4afa2e59, Zexi Li)

Others (1)

  • etcd-operator: remove fix etcd size, pod anti affinity required (56d536c6, wanyaoqi)

dashboard

仓库地址: https://github.com/yunionio/dashboard

7 commits to dashboard - v3.8.13 since this release.

Bug Fixes (6)

  • #8462 镜像市场从ISO导入arm的镜像后，该ISO的cpu架构不应该是x86的 (557490437, gaomingjiu@yunion.cn)
  • #8457 通过api新建的虚拟机开机状态下调整配置，套餐列表不应该显示加载中 (7899f80fd, gaomingjiu@yunion.cn)
  • #8457 通过api新建的虚拟机开机状态下调整配置，套餐列表不应该显示加载中 (adb13a8e8, gaomingjiu@yunion.cn)
  • missing instance group text in ip list (ae2edddd5, Qiu Jian)
  • 调整监控数据参数 (ced241069, gaomingjiu@yunion.cn)
  • monitor: no data in response (50ca22c3e, Zexi Li)

Features (1)

  • #3829 license申请跳转路径问题 (1681083a3, GuoLiBin6)

ocadm

仓库地址: https://github.com/yunionio/ocadm

1 commits to ocadm - v3.8.13 since this release.

Bug Fixes (1)

  • not wait cloudnet component (47db420f, Zexi Li)

item.title: Docs: v3.8.12
item.description:
发布时间 2022-06-16 10:42:55

cloudpods

仓库地址: https://github.com/yunionio/cloudpods

28 commits to cloudpods - v3.8.12 since this release.

Bug Fixes (22)

  • remove virtio-blk num-queues param (3d9a825243, Qiu Jian)
  • keystoen cronman use uninitialized admin token (#14441) (9cc78f1463, Jian Qiu)
  • manage_ntp_configuration not effective (#14428) (828643166d, Jian Qiu)
  • hide server rtc_change event log (#14336) (d2415d0033, Jian Qiu)
  • server associate eip check (#14341) (fce049d24a, Jian Qiu)
  • recover host status if maintain an empty host (f4fc88fc74, Qiu Jian)
  • allow set pagination order (#14357) (3e60efb32c, Jian Qiu)
  • more detailed log for server hange_config (#14361) (b2867062bc, Jian Qiu)
  • disable disk multi-queue (9492e3aa20, Qiu Jian)
  • cloudevent: allow disable sync cloudevent (#14448) (f2070dc854, 屈轩)
  • host: ceph pool size (f66242d72e, ioito)
  • host: Telegraf 1.19.2 conf (d061c10c3b, Zexi Li)
  • host: openvswitch service name on UOS (#14392) (e6e6e2c52e, Zexi Li)
  • region: disk save task (19227df5fb, ioito)
  • region: clean vm misc options (7e04045903, ioito)
  • region: aliyun disk external id (837f40a3ad, ioito)
  • region: public cloud user data (74140324cb, ioito)
  • region: api doc replace tab to space (fb4f8d225b, ioito)
  • region: aliyun bucket access url (13948c87f7, ioito)
  • region: eip allocate (#14391) (856bff47c3, 屈轩)
  • region: add filter for eip (507c2922ec, ioito)
  • region: eip update (#14320) (42bf085392, 屈轩)

Feature (1)

  • fetch options of an application via api (#14395) (0dbbd1c4fc, Jian Qiu)

Features (2)

  • baremetal: wrap pxe error (#14461) (97a18aaed9, Zexi Li)
  • region,host: support multiqueues on vhost network (#14459) (a208f0afb7, Jian Qiu)

Others (3)

  • fix(region):资源统计bug，已使用资源统计包含裸金属资源，总数未包含，导致资源使用率统计异常。 guestUsage统计中排除掉裸金属资源，hypervisors.Delete(api.HYPERVISOR_CONTAINER, api.HYPERVISOR_BAREMETAL) (#14403) (1d8009083a, Jian Qiu)
  • update vendor release/3.8 20220604 (#14401) (56b1d9e7fb, Jian Qiu)
  • add options to set disk driver and cachemode (81992ba365, Qiu Jian)

cloudpods-operator

仓库地址: https://github.com/yunionio/cloudpods-operator

8 commits to cloudpods-operator - v3.8.12 since this release.

Bug Fixes (5)

  • fail to compile due to vendor issue (e4d3090f, Qiu Jian)
  • minor fixes for 3.8 (e371d1ac, Qiu Jian)
  • operator: match etcd and grpc version (aaef4fdd, Zexi Li)
  • telegraf: use release-1.19.2-0 image (23fc5429, Zexi Li)
  • vendor: sync vendor to match etcd and grpc mod (67591341, Zexi Li)

Feature (1)

  • add disable_local_vpc, enable_cloud_net, enable_s3gateway var (44fc7c7b, Qiu Jian)

Others (2)

  • codegent (3fcd0823, Qiu Jian)
  • update vendor 20220605 (30862ea9, Qiu Jian)

dashboard

仓库地址: https://github.com/yunionio/dashboard

20 commits to dashboard - v3.8.12 since this release.

Bug Fixes (11)

  • i18n (e1b4e078a, gaomingjiu@yunion.cn)
  • #8441 修改VNC连接禁用文案提示信息 (f47185af6, gaomingjiu@yunion.cn)
  • #8440 eip 飞天支持带宽展示 (7c426c492, GuoLiBin6)
  • #8405 修复 按固定单位转换数值函数-无法像高级单位转换问题 (d9bae9f62, GuoLiBin6)
  • #8425 kvm的宿主机上虚拟机数量0，进入维护模式模式按钮应该置灰不可点击 (b10f7d948, mj)
  • #8421 新建cloudpods云账号时，点击获取密钥的详情文档时url应该传递正确 (7f04e9dfd, mj)
  • remove debuger console (3c00fa45f, gaomingjiu@yunion.cn)
  • #8362 包年包月的虚拟机调整配置时，磁盘返写不应该为空 (1413b1c30, gaomingjiu@yunion.cn)
  • lb操作验证错误 (0c92d3750, GuoLiBin6)
  • #8419 VMware主机更换镜像后，不会更新系统盘的大小 (7c3f65592, gaomingjiu@yunion.cn)
  • #8366 下载方式优化 (b1c08c9cf, GuoLiBin6)

Features (9)

  • 更新多网卡队列增加条件限制 (46cc2df3f, gaomingjiu@yunion.cn)
  • #3825 私有云虚拟机网卡多队列支持 (df968dc83, gaomingjiu@yunion.cn)
  • #3803 mfa验证 (1b19c7d4f, GuoLiBin6)
  • #3803 主机重装系统增加mfa验证 (7d28be184, GuoLiBin6)
  • #3757 eip绑定资源提示优化 (75c283e6f, GuoLiBin6)
  • #3808 设置代理文案修改 (106565a84, GuoLiBin6)
  • #3783 短信页面的进入控制台统一都改成 登录阿里云控制台 (8a9f1048e, gaomingjiu@yunion.cn)
  • #3797 新建邮箱通知渠道时，给发件人邮箱增加提示说明 (c31f28b1a, gaomingjiu@yunion.cn)
  • #3757 eip绑定资源提示优化 (ac2257a74, GuoLiBin6)

sdnagent

仓库地址: https://github.com/yunionio/sdnagent

1 commits to sdnagent - v3.8.12 since this release.

Others (1)

  • disable security group (6d97840, Qiu Jian)

item.title: Docs: v3.7.10
item.description:
发布时间 2021-12-01 20:04:07

cloudpods

仓库地址: https://github.com/yunionio/cloudpods

27 commits to cloudpods - v3.7.10 since this release.

Bug Fixes (22)

  • fix version of sqlchemy to v1.0.0 for release/3.7 (08d7ef3e7a, Qiu Jian)
  • delayed probing GPU on host init and add disable_gpu option (cba42da3b4, Qiu Jian)
  • vpcagent fail to refresh session token (20dab1e89d, Qiu Jian)
  • cleanup compile warnings (#12622) (c400485b3a, Jian Qiu)
  • close it after using sql.Rows (6b043e2392, rainzm)
  • add license upload (bb5bb827d1, Qu Xuan)
  • false delted field for deleted resources (c803b96fca, Qiu Jian)
  • fail to free reserved ip in non-owner project (ad737c19cb, Qiu Jian)
  • apigateway request api_server option directly from keystone (05812fb3f8, Qiu Jian)
  • ansibleserver: update file-repo from v0.3.3 to v0.3.4 (ff8ea35f96, rainzm)
  • cloudevent: qcloud event time (e673037461, Qu Xuan)
  • esxi: avoid uplink dvpg (ddd9c7b3a7, rainzm)
  • host: only local disk enable file.locking option on arm64 host (8de1411e64, Zexi Li)
  • region: openstack.go (90e3ad8463, yangbaoqiang)
  • region: avoid panic when query is nil (b90811d0bd, Qu Xuan)
  • region: apsara rds network sync (b99eb92ef2, Qu Xuan)
  • region: add rows.Close func (4bf7b68e56, yangbaoqiang)
  • region: delete instance snapshot itself after deleting subsnapshots (b6a8a381f3, rainzm)
  • region: init timerQueue correctly (0bb2ee63d7, rainzm)
  • region: delete vm and disk when it was not found (e015e06072, ioito)
  • region: avoid cidr change 0.0.0.0/0 (4b5b628fac, Qu Xuan)
  • webconsole: host ssh use cloudroot user error (bf9864632e, Zexi Li)

Features (3)

  • cloudproxy: add purge-forward for proxy endpoint (b7c7884c04, rainzm)
  • region: add have-agent action for guest (808c0392fd, rainzm)
  • region,host: create or update server add machine option (#12607) (3a258e01b3, Zexi Li)

Others (2)

  • qcloud&aliyun update backend weight value range fix (2fb770bf19, tb365)
  • guest start sync with cloud vm (33aeb77d41, tb365)

dashboard

Bug Fixes (16)

  • 镜像选择查找 (f3cc2436a, GuoLiBin6)

  • date select filter error (458607a21, GuoLiBin6)
  • vminstance memory accuracy (75b601b22, GuoLiBin6)
  • cloudgroup add export columns (3f4bb6f84, GuoLiBin6)
  • vm_mem_size accuracy (77ddfa352, GuoLiBin6)
  • fail to free reserved ip in non-owner project (7b7e2bdbb, Qiu Jian)
  • update public cachedimage interface params (659c833ca, gaomingjiu@yunion.cn)
  • #7932 宿主机提示优化 (3dad21b3d, gaomingjiu@yunion.cn)
  • #7928 宿主机导出没有平台字段 (29fd6e4d9, gaomingjiu@yunion.cn)
  • set machine type on server create (402c3055f, Qiu Jian)

item.title: Docs: v3.6.22
item.description:
发布时间 2021-09-07 14:04:37

cloudpods

仓库地址: https://github.com/yunionio/cloudpods

40 commits to cloudpods - v3.6.22 since this release.

Bug Fixes (39)

  • resolve permission issues for samlusers and quotas (aec0affa1b, Qiu Jian)
  • avoid double counting when compute networks nic count (07aab1daea, rainzm)
  • routes to private prefixes should be distributed on private nic (9290e6fbd7, Qiu Jian)
  • inter-vm traffic limited by eip bandwidth limit (5bbe39749a, Qiu Jian)
  • dhcp classless route encoding error (288c0d5612, Qiu Jian)
  • server migrate network to a vlan network (5fff71781f, Qiu Jian)
  • baremetal: increase ipmitool reboot sleep wait time (18c8973c6d, Zexi Li)
  • baremetal: inject mac to cmdline (53a6960478, Zexi Li)
  • baremetal: inject mac when admin nic found (89e8b1fdda, Zexi Li)
  • baremetal: reindex nic (#12087) (17b80d528f, Zexi Li)
  • climc: add version list command (171792d6ce, Qu Xuan)
  • cloudcommon: avoid service exit when etcd unreachable (dc37976b50, Zexi Li)
  • cloudid: avoid sync clouduser twice (1bd783aef8, Qu Xuan)
  • cloudid: azure attach enabled subscription policy (916fa8d4b0, Qu Xuan)
  • esxiagetn: keep compatible with the lower version vcenter when copying the disk (5a34578f94, rainzm)
  • host-deployer: XFS uuid冲突 无法 mount (8e582878cd, panda)
  • keystone: appsrv listen multi port failed cause of race condition (372b2ff6a1, Zexi Li)
  • monitor: fix resource details can’t show monitor metric (4c668de666, zhaoxiangchun)
  • region: return sql error (3fbb27b8ef, Qu Xuan)
  • region: delete dirty network (8da9634767, Qu Xuan)
  • region: azure vm disk size (b4f4bd7502, Qu Xuan)
  • region: baremetal server reuse ip address condition (3f6db673b5, Zexi Li)
  • region: return region sql error (e86e95faf0, Qu Xuan)
  • region: lb resource count (43ab653d49, Qu Xuan)
  • region: not set baremetal is_maintenance when action is start (dc819e77fc, Zexi Li)
  • region: sync openstack multi zone storages (0025975b4e, Qu Xuan)
  • region: prohibit resizing the disk of a esxi vm with instance snapshots (c58c36eab8, rainzm)
  • region: avoid get openstack hostid panic (935d73f330, Qu Xuan)
  • region: sync with multi worker (b9bb7679eb, Qu Xuan)
  • region: adjust the query range corresponding to the alarm strategy (8a4f0cecd1, rainzm)
  • region: allow guest network zero bandwidth limit (0abdd5195d, Zexi Li)
  • region: baremetal server resued address nic count should be subtracted (f461726f58, Zexi Li)
  • region: resource count for cachedimages (d70235fd11, Qu Xuan)
  • region: enable zstack allocate ip by itself (c6177d7228, Qu Xuan)
  • region: aliyun rds network sync (ca844df22f, Qu Xuan)
  • region: sync aliyun classic network ip addr (40c020e768, Qu Xuan)
  • region: baremetal spec condition (2141af918d, Zexi Li)

item.title: Docs: v3.8.0
item.description:
发布时间 2021-08-27 13:13:35

Features (13)

  • build: go generate use vendor (e172ef3, Zexi Li)

notify-plugins

仓库地址: https://github.com/yunionio/notify-plugins

5 commits to notify-plugins - v3.8.0 since this release.

Bug Fixes (3)

  • build: build arm64 image (4a11361, Zexi Li)
  • workwx: no user exist (41dc5d9, rainzm)

ocadm

仓库地址: https://github.com/yunionio/ocadm

13 commits to ocadm - v3.8.0 since this release.

Bug Fixes (7)

  • set operator imagePullPolicy IfNotPresent (96432152, Zexi Li)
  • cluster: update vendor make build pass (76a69b52, Zexi Li)
  • cluster: set OS_PROJECT_DOMAIN of cluster auth info (1096cccd, Zexi Li)
  • git: 切分支例行更新 version tag (b7a01634, Zhang Dongliang)
  • k8s,keepalived: 解决 k8s 高可用集群在部署时无法获取 nodeip 的问题 (1536c295, Zhang Dongliang)
  • keepalived: 解决 高可用架构部署的默认网卡传递参数问题 (676a3640, Zhang Dongliang)
  • preflight: more accurate of mysql grant error (df3afb6c, Zexi Li)

Features (4)

  • build: 增加arm 下编译 ocadm deb 的步骤(make deb)； 统一跨平台metrics-server 的 tag 名称；升级 k8s-sidecar 到 0.1.275 (d672ebef, Zhang Dongliang)
  • calico,k8s,ovn: 部置calico-node时调整默认配置提升ovn隧道流量的性能 (c4a14ec8, Zhang Dongliang)
  • keepalived,ha: 新增 keepalived_interface 变量支持,以便在安装高可用多网卡情况下支持非默认网卡绑定 vip (866ef392, Zhang Dongliang)
  • longhorn: support migrate to source pvc from longhorn pvc (2df20ecb, wanyaoqi)

Misc (1)

  • vendor: update vendor to master branch (051f70fb, Zexi Li)

Others (1)

  • update mod (0cc9f1e1, TangBin)

Features (1)

Others (3)

  • .circleci: go test with “-mod vendor” (f59f416, Yousong Zhou)

Ovn (1)

  • mapped: fix possible traffic loop across different vpcs (b8c2af6, Yousong Zhou)

Utils (1)

  • guest: ignore “secgroup” or “secgroups” (394ccc0, Yousong Zhou)

Vendor (1)

  • bump to current tip of release/3.7 (bf49b2d, Yousong Zhou)
